Developed, maintained and coordinated syndicated radio programs.   Developed and managed 24 hour national radio formats. Managed daily operations of WWDM-FM, coordinated promotions for the local sales team and on-air production.  Ranked #1 with Persons both 18-34 and 24-54.          Education      Associate of Arts   :   Mass Communications      Lincoln College   －   City  ,   State  ,   USA            Skills      Media Consulting and Digital Content Analysis  Syndicated Development and Management  Affiliate Sales Management and Analysis  Radio and Podcasting Brand Management Development  Digital Content Delivery and Music Scheduling   Social Media Integration and SEO Development  Website Development and Consulting Services
story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

From humble beginnings with an Associate's degree in Mass Communications from Lincoln College, this media professional has carved out an impressive journey in broadcast management and media sales.

Their story begins in 2001 when they joined WWDM-FM as an Operations Director, Brand Manager, and On-Air Personality. During their eight-year tenure, they didn't just manage daily operations - they dominated the airwaves, achieving #1 rankings across multiple age demographics (18-34 and 24-54). They expertly juggled content delivery, operations management, and promotional coordination with the local sales team.

In late 2009, they leveled up to a Senior Director role, where they spent over four years orchestrating affiliate sales and managing on-air talent. Their creative prowess shone through as they developed and managed 24-hour national radio formats and coordinated syndicated radio programs.

Since April 2013, they've been working as an independent consultant, where they continue to make waves in the industry. Their current role involves creating national programming for radio stations nationwide, working alongside major record labels and social media integrators. They've become a master of multiple trades - from affiliate sales management to social media integration, from digital content development to email marketing.

Throughout their career, they've achieved remarkable success as a major market on-air personality and Brand Manager. They've left their mark by creating several syndicated radio shows and successfully distributing national broadcast products. Their expertise in increasing market share for radio consolidators across the country has made them a valuable asset in the broadcasting world.

Today, they continue to evolve with the industry, combining traditional broadcast expertise with modern digital skills like SEO development, website consulting, and podcast brand management. Their story is one of continuous adaptation and growth in the ever-changing landscape of media and broadcasting.
